Articles.Content: So Prometheus just came out in the U.S., and I was wondering if anyone had seen it. Was it worth seeing?

IMO, it\'s good and worth watching. I was surprised that the horror aspects seem less well done than the SF ones. The ending was more reminiscent of Terminator than Alien in some ways.

On a random note, this is the 4th movie with Noomi Rapace cast as a ridiculously badass character named some version of 'Elizabeth.'
I haven\'t either, but it looks very good. Anything to do with Alien is on my list!

I\'ll probably stop in and see it. I really enjoyed Alien, so it needs to be good to out do the original. I\'m not a huge horror fan, but I love Sci-fi. If the sci-fi elements are more brought out that\'s great.

I saw it over the weekend, and it\'s a great movie My dad and brother thought the plot had too many holes, but I\'m pretty sure the only reason they went to see it anyways was to watch aliens kill people, not to actually think.

They used the same X-shaped warning screen as Mother had during scuttle procedure when they had the Prometheus collide with the alien ship.

That was something I really appreciated.

Something else I noted:

ALIEN FRANCHISE MOVIES IN WHICH ANDROIDS GET THEIR HEADS RIPPED OFF

Alien - Yes, Science Officer Ash

Aliens - Yes, Executive Officer Bishop

Alien 3 - Yes, again XO Bishop, from Aliens

Alien: Ressurection - Nope

Prometheus - Yes, Technician/Flight Assistant David
